data.name: EBOLA 3
data.detailed_description:
GAME DESCRIPTION:

The further you dive into this mysterious adventure, the more you learn about the shocking events, that happened in David's life, and the clinic on Brut Street.
The plot develops rapidly and merges you into a mystical and dangerous story written in all the best traditions of the Survival Horror genre.
Throughout the game, you'll visit many dark and atmospheric locations, solve various puzzles, fight various enemies and make different decisions along the way.

Everything will depend on you! This dangerous adventure will have two outcomes.

FEATURES:


Large game map
â€¢ 5 city locations.
â€¢ 3 hospital floors
â€¢ 10 floors, "Krot-529" scientific underground station.
â€¢ Each floor has a unique interior.
â€¢ Replayability.



Interaction
â€¢ It is possible to interact with many objects.
â€¢ Nonlinearity.

Opponents
â€¢ Various enemies, confront the enemies, explore dark rooms - all this will stand in the way to the salvation of the character.
â€¢ Unique epic bosses.
â€¢ A large number of weapons.
â€¢ Crafting of bullets.
â€¢ 3 difficulty modes.
â€¢ Body Deformation system. (Gore)



Unknown danger, undiscovered world
â€¢ The game will give you unrivaled surge of adrenaline, an exciting storyline and unimaginable horrors. The world around the player will change; danger lurks at every turn.

The revival of the genre
â€¢ Three game endings.
â€¢ A well-designed environment and properly selected lighting create an atmosphere of horror, high-quality audio sounds â€“ all this creates a unique world of the game, which keeps you at the peak of tension from the beginning till the end.

It is recommended to play in headphones, for full immersion.

All characters, events, music and locations are completely fictional, any coincidences with real people, other works, films and games are random.

data.short_description: EBOLA 3 - is created in the spirit of the great classics of survival horrors. In this game, you will control the main character with a first-person camera which makes you feel like youâ€™re in a real horror movie.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Russian, French, Italian, German, Vietnamese, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese, Japanese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel CORE i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 820m
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 64-Bit
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel CORE i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 64-Bit

content_descriptors.notes:
Attention! Viewer discretion is advised. The game
contains scenes of violence and blood.
